Class PDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Date
      • it.eng.pilot.PDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<java.util.Date>

    public class PDate
extends java.util.Date
    Classe di utilità per le date
    Author:
    Antonio Corinaldi
